alert.note: Alert for Far Northwest Highlands; Jemez Mountains; Northern Sangre de Cristo Mountains; Southern Sangre de Cristo Mountains; Tusas Mountains Including Chama (New Mexico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albuquerque (Northern and Central New Mexico)
info.headline: Winter Storm Watch issued January 16 at 11:42AM MST until January 18 at 12:00AM MST by NWS Albuquerque
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 6 PM MST THIS EVENING THROUGH TUESDAY EVENING... * WHAT...Heavy snow possible. Total snow accumulations generally between 6 and 12 inches possible. * WHERE...Northern and Southern Sangre de Cristo Mountains, Far Northwest Highlands, Tusas Mountains Including Chama, and Jemez Mountains. * WHEN...From 6 PM MST this evening through Tuesday evening. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. Check road conditions before heading out. The hazardous conditions could impact the Monday evening and Tuesday morning commutes.
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts for updates on this situation.

area.areaDesc: Far Northwest Highlands; Jemez Mountains; Northern Sangre de Cristo Mountains; Southern Sangre de Cristo Mountains; Tusas Mountains Including Chama
